resources.string: There are no open restaurants near you right now. Please try again later.
We failed to find a restaurant suggestion for you. Please try again later.
This location will be used to help you find nearby restaurants when we are unable to get your current location.
Because we are unable to get your current location right now, please enter in a location we can use to find nearby restaurants for you.
Your default location has been set.

Hey, it looks like you\'re a frequent user of Food Button! If you have a couple seconds, I would be incredibly grateful if you could rate this app in the Play Store. Don\'t worry, I won\'t bother you with this ever again no matter what you choose. Thank you again for even downloading this app to begin with.
Click the refresh button to immediately load another restaurant suggestion.
Click the address to immediately start heading over to the restaurant.
Click the phone number to give the restaurant a call.
You can review this tutorial at any time by clicking the info button. Happy eating!
You need to enable location services in order for Food Button to help you find nearby restaurants.
